sentences.en: Ann's looking awful thin. Let's give her some food and fatten her up.
sentences.cn: 小安看起来太瘦了. 我们给她点食物,将她喂胖.

sentences.en: Each year Alaskans fatten their wallets with a dividend check from an oil fund.
sentences.cn: 每年,阿拉斯加人都会从石油投资中获得巨额分红.

sentences.en: Giving pigs fine feed can fatten them up.
sentences.cn: 给猪喂精饲料可以催膘.

sentences.en: He's trying to fatten Dan up so they can hibernate together.
sentences.cn: 它想把丹喂得胖胖的,陪它一起冬眠!

sentences.en: How do we fatten our portfolios and stay financially healthy?
sentences.cn: 我们怎样育肥我们的投资结构和维持财政健康 呢 ?

sentences.en: It requires a great deal more grain to fatten animals then to feed people directly.
sentences.cn: 因为人们需要更多的谷物,来喂养更多的牲畜,最终来满足人们对肉类的消耗.

sentences.en: Mothers usually fatten their children up with milk.
sentences.cn: 母亲们通常给孩子们吃牛奶好让他们长胖.

sentences.en: The child is underweight. I'm trying to fatten him up as fast as I can.
sentences.cn: 这孩子体重不足. 我正设法尽快地使他壮实起来.

sentences.en: The creature continued to grow and fatten.
sentences.cn: 这个家伙继续长大、变肥。

sentences.en: The farmer tried to fatten the lean cattle for market.
sentences.cn: 农夫试图把瘦牛养肥以上市.

sentences.en: The new feed can fatten the chicken up quickly enough for market.
sentences.cn: 新饲料能使鸡长得更快,以适应市场需求.

sentences.en: They have kept the price of sugar artificially high and so fattened the company's profits.
sentences.cn: 他们一直人为地使糖价居高不下，以此为公司牟利。

sentences.en: Watch out when you are getting all you want; fatten hog ai not in luck.
sentences.cn: 正当你心想事成、万事如意之际,尤需小心提防;正在长肥的公猪, 并不是交上了什么运气的呢.

sentences.en: We keep animals in pens to fatten them.
sentences.cn: 我们把动物关在围栏里把它们养肥.

sentences.en: You're too skinny — we'll have to fatten you up.
sentences.cn: 你太瘦了，我们要把你养胖些。

sentences.en: Your article seems rather thin in places; can you fatten it out a little?
sentences.cn: 你的文章在某些地方略显空洞; 你能把它充实一点 吗 ?

words.tran_cn: 肥的，胖的；油腻的；丰满的
正被养肥的；用于养肥禽畜的
脂肪的；肥胖的；多脂肪的；脂肪过多的

trans.tran_cn: 长胖， 变肥； 使…肥沃； 装满
trans.tran_en: to make an animal become fatter so that it is ready to eat, or to become fat and ready to eat

trans.tran_cn: 喂肥，养肥（牲畜），使（钱）增多，使（公司）升值
